about.heroTagline: Essential resources for modern agriculture and farming
about.introP1: Agross is a brand that supplies essential resources for modern agriculture and farming. Our main activity is the production of greenhouse film and providing everything necessary for the full operation of a greenhouse.
about.introP2: We offer comprehensive solutions, covering everything from greenhouse construction to the necessary equipment.
about.experienceText: With years of experience, we started our operations in 2004. Since 2016, we have been working in partnership with Korea, Russia, Iran, and China.
about.promiseCardText: Our core brand promise is safety and life. This commitment guides all our activities and is reflected in every product we offer.
about.philosophyIntro: Our philosophy is based on two key concepts essential for successful farming:
about.protectionText: We provide reliable structures. The greenhouse form we support signifies protection and safety. Every product is designed to protect your crops and investment.
about.productivityText: We promote growth and yield. The leaf is our symbol of productivity and vitality. Every solution is created to produce maximum yield and quality products.
about.balanceNote: These principles are carefully balanced to visually express our brand promise.
about.characterDescription: The core character of the Agross brand is described as kind and creative. We strive to provide modern and minimalistic solutions tailored to the needs and direction of the greenhouse industry.
about.audienceIntro: Agross serves a broad market segment, including low, middle, and upper-middle-class customers. Among our valued clients are:
about.audienceEntrepreneursText: Complete solutions for entrepreneurs starting a new business and expanding their operations.
about.audienceFarmersText: Convenient and high-quality products for farmers wishing to build a greenhouse on their land plots.
about.audienceLargeScaleText: Professional-grade solutions for farmers engaged in large-scale cultivation.
about.ctaText: Discover all the products and services you need for your greenhouse
